Fear of Relapse is different to depression and anxiety and is a natural consequence of having cancer. However, if unrecognised and left untreated, patients can experience “life paralysis” and become unable to imagine a future, make any plans, or think even one day ahead.

Although half the study participants had depression symptoms after finishing chemotherapy, these resolved naturally over the next 3 months. This implies that (just like neuropathy or hair loss) depression can be a chemical effect of chemotherapy.
